ekādaśaḥ prakāśaḥ
śākta kāmarāja vidyā lopāmudrā bheda nirūpaṇam śākta pañcamī bheda nirūpaṇañca
prāk ukta mantra doṣa smāraṇam
prakāśe daśame amutra śrīvidyā viṣaye kila
abhiśaptasya mantrasya kāraṇam likhitam mayā
atha ākīlitavidyā nirūpaṇa pratijñā
atha atokīlitām vidyām śāktām parama durlabhām
ūrddhvāmnāya mahā tantre śivena parikīrtitām
saṅketena pravakṣyāmi śrī guroḥ kṛpayā parām
śākta kāma rāja vidyā tatra vāc bhavakūṭam
vāma akṣī bhaga varṇaḥ tu kāmam indrau maheśvarī
kāma rāja śakti kūṭe
pūrvavat kāma śakti ākhyau varṇau niṣkīlita ātmakau
pūrvam daśame prakāśe kamalākara upākhyānena abhiśaptasya
śāmbhava kāmarāja mantrasya siddhi pratibandhaka tvam viśeṣeṇa upapādya prakāśe smin tat
smārayati prakāśaḥ ityādinā sā śāmbhava kāmarāja vidyā
kīlita tva doṣa parihāra krama anusaraṇam antareṇa anārādhitā siddhim pratibadhnāti
vakṣyamāṇa śākta kāmarāja vidyā tu kīlita tva ādi doṣa parihīna tayā sādhakaiḥ
sutarām upādeyā iti eva āha atha atas ityādinā
idānīm tām akīlitām śākta kāmarāja vidyām ūrddhvāmnāya tantra anusāriṇīm āha

original: vāmākṣītyādinā | vāmākṣī īkāraḥ, bhagavarṇa ekāraḥ, kāmaḥ kakāraḥ indro lakāraḥ,
analyzed: vāma akṣī ityādinā vāma akṣī īkāraḥ bhaga varṇaḥ ekāraḥ kāmaḥ kakāraḥ indraḥ lakāraḥ
asyāḥ niṣkīlita tvam prakarṣaḥ ca
sa vīryā mokṣa dā nityā trailokya vaśa kāriṇī
pūrva āmnāya mahā vidyā su goptavyā prayatnataḥ
lopāmudrām pravakṣyāmi paścima āmnāya yojitām
hasau kāmaḥ śakraḥ bhuvana bhaya bhaṅga vyasaninī
śivaḥ somaḥ sūryaḥ madana dahanaḥ śakragirije
vidhuḥ brahmā bhūmiḥ bhuvana jananī bīja ghaṭitā
bhajanti ete dhanyāḥ parama pada vijñāna nipuṇāḥ

original: maheśvarī hrīṃ | evañca ī e ka la hrīmiti vāgbhavakūṭamiti paryavasyati | pūrvavaditi |
analyzed: maheśvarī hrīṃ evañca ī e ka la hrīm iti vāc bhava kūṭam iti paryavasyati pūrvavat iti

original: atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ  pūrvaṃ śāmbhavakāmarājavidyāyāṃ ka e ī la hrīmiti
analyzed: atra ayam abhiprāyaḥ pūrvam śāmbhava kāmarāja vidyāyām ka e ī la hrīm iti
nirukta vāc bhava kūṭa samāveśena eva tasyāḥ kīlita tvam atas tad vāc bhava kūṭa parityāgena

original: yadyaparakūṭadvayam ī e ka la hrīmityetanmantroktavāgbhavakūṭena saṃyojyeta, tadā na
analyzed: yadi apara kūṭa dvayam ī e ka la hrīm iti etad mantra ukta vāgbhava kūṭena saṃyojyeta tadā na
kīlita tva doṣaḥ imam eva artham sūcayitum atra tad vilakṣaṇam vāc bhavakūṭa mātram abhidhāya

original: pūrvavat kāmaśaktyākhyāvityādinā ha sa ka ha la hrīṃ, sa ka la hrīmityetayoḥ
analyzed: pūrvavat kāma śakti ākhyau ityādinā ha sa ka ha la hrīṃ sa ka la hrīm iti etayoḥ
kāma rāja śakti kūṭayoḥ grahaṇam samudita mantrasya niṣkīlita tvam ca abhihitam iti niṣkarṣaḥ
kūṭa traya vibhāga pūrvakam samuditaḥ mantraḥ pradarśyate
śāmbhavīm lopāmudrām saṃhāra doṣa yuktām āha hasau ityādinā hasau iti
śuklam vāc bhavam ādi bījam uditam śāstreṣu buddhi prada
raktam koṭi sitetara aṃśu sadṛśam kāma adhirājam param

original: vaśyaṃ yasya carācarādi jagato yoniśca yā kīrtitā
analyzed: vaśyam yasya carācara ādi jagataḥ yoniḥ ca yā kīrtitā
śāktam gauram ananta tāpa śamanam bījam śivam sādhakaiḥ
asyāḥ prakarṣaḥ
śiva śakti mayī devī sākṣāt tripurasundarī
durlabhā paramā vidyā saṃhāra doṣa saṃyutā

śāktala upāmudrā tatra vāgbhavakūṭam

original: 11 | mantrāntaramāha  eṣeti | prāguktā pañcadaśākṣarī śrīḥ śrīvidyaiva prāṇena
analyzed: eva

original: haṃsabījena haṃsa iti varṇadvayenetyarthaḥ, saṃyuktā cettadā saptadaśākṣarī mahātripurasundarī
analyzed: haṃsa bījena haṃsaḥ iti varṇa dvayena iti arthaḥ saṃyuktā ced tadā saptadaśa akṣarī mahā tripurasundarī
bhavet iti arthaḥ tat uktam tantrasāre
eṣā śrīḥ prāṇa saṃyuktā dāridrya duḥkha mocanī
iti etat mantra svarūpam pradarśyate
pūrve yad ādau ca tri mūrtikā ca
jyotsnā yadā syāt paratas tathāvat
tadā hi mantre viniyojya bījam
pravartatā īrṇaḥ kramaśas viśeṣaḥ
idam tu kathitam sāram
saptadaśa akṣaram mantra antaram
paran ca kathayāmi atha
tatra vāc bhava kāma rājakūṭayoḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: vāgbhave kāmarāje ca śaktirādyā bhaved yadi || 13 ||
analyzed: vāc bhave kāmarāje ca śaktiḥ ādyā bhavet yadi
pūrvavat śakti kūṭam ca yojayet tad anantaram

original: 12 | mantrāntaramāha  pūrva iti | pūrve prāguktakāmarājavidyāyā vāgbhavakūṭe
yadā ādau trimūrtikā dīrghekārastathā jyotsnā ekāraḥ syāt, etena ī e ka la hrīmiti
analyzed: yadā ādau tri mūrtikā dīrgha ekāraḥ tathā jyotsnā ekāraḥ syāt etena ī e ka la hrīm iti

original: vāgbhavakūṭaṃ yadā syāditi bodhyam | tadā mantre
analyzed: vāc bhava kūṭam yadā syāt iti bodhyam tadā mantre
prāk uktāyām īkāra ādi kāmarājavidyāyām iti arthaḥ bījam haṃsa bījam viniyojya trikūṭa ante iti

original: śeṣaḥ, vakṣyamāṇamantre tathā darśanāt | kramaśo viśeṣā'rṇaḥ viśiṣṭo mantro
analyzed: śeṣaḥ vakṣyamāṇa mantre tathā darśanāt kramaśas viśeṣa arṇaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ
bhavati iti arthaḥ rekhāpātena ayam mantraḥ pradarśyate

original: 13-15 | atha saptadaśākṣaraṃ mantrāntaraṃ vaktuṃ pratijānīte  parañcetyādinā |
analyzed: atha saptadaśa akṣaram mantra antaram vaktum pratijānīte
asya api mantrasya trikūṭa ghaṭita tvena prathamam vāc bhava kāma rājakūṭayoḥ vyavasthām āha

original: vāgbhava ityādinā | prāguktasaptadaśākṣaramantrasyaiva vāgbhavakūṭe yadi śaktirādyā bhavet
analyzed: vāc bhavaḥ ityādinā prāk ukta saptadaśa akṣara mantrasya eva vāc bhava kūṭe yadi śaktiḥ ādyā bhavet

original: prāguktekārādhaḥsthitamekāraṃ yadīkārāt pūrvaṃ yojayedityarthaḥ | tathā kāmarājakūṭe yadi
analyzed: prāc ukta ikāra adhas sthitam ekāram yadi īkārāt pūrvam yojayet iti arthaḥ tathā kāmarājakūṭe yadi
śaktiḥ
trikūṭa ante haṃsabījam bindu sarga samanvitam

aṣṭādaśa akṣarī
aiṃkāram prathame kūṭe klīṃkāram kāmarājake

original: sakāraḥ ādyā bhavet hakārādhaḥsthitaṃ sakāraṃ yadi hakārāt pūrvaṃ yojayedityarthaḥ |
analyzed: sakāraḥ ādyā bhavet hakāra adhas sthitam sakāram yadi hakārāt pūrvam yojayet iti arthaḥ

śuddha aśuddha sa bala mantra nirūpaṇam tatra meru nirṇayaḥ ṛṣibhiḥ daivataiḥ ca ārādhitā
mantra bhedāḥ dīpanī vāmakeśī vidyā svarūpa nirūpaṇañca
trividha mantra nirūpaṇa pratijñā
śuddha aśuddha phalāḥ mantrāḥ tathā tu ubhaya saṃjñakāḥ
subhagāyāḥ bhavanti eva tat eva atha nigadyate
vakṣyamāṇa mantrāṇām meruḥ
bhūmiḥ candraḥ śivaḥ māyā śaktiḥ kṛṣṇa adhvamādanau
arddhacandraḥ ca binduḥ ca navārṇaḥ meruḥ ucyate
mahā tripurasundaryāḥ mantrāḥ meru samudbhavāḥ  /
lakārāt pṛthivī jātā sa śaila vana kānanā
pañcāśat pīṭha sampannā sarva tīrtha mayī parā
ubhaya saṃjñakāḥ śuddha aśuddha ubhaya phalāḥ ca iti arthaḥ
atha mahā tripurasundarī mantrāṇām meru bhūta varṇebhyaḥ utpattim didarśayiṣuḥ

original: prathamaṃ meruvarṇān nirdiśati-bhūmirityādinā | bhūmiḥ pṛthvībījaṃ lakāraḥ, candraḥ
analyzed: prathamam meru varṇān nirdiśati bhūmiḥ ityādinā bhūmiḥ pṛthvī bījam lakāraḥ candraḥ

original: sakāraḥ, śivo hakāraḥ, māyā īkāraḥ, śaktirekāraḥ, kṛṣṇādhvā vahni rakāraḥ, mādanaḥ
analyzed: sakāraḥ śivaḥ hakāraḥ māyā īkāraḥ śaktiḥ ekāraḥ kṛṣṇādhvā vahni rakāraḥ mādanaḥ

original: kakāraḥ, arddhacandrabindū prasiddhau | navārṇa iti nava arṇā lakārādayo yatra tathābhūto
analyzed: kakāraḥ arddha candra bindū prasiddhau navārṇaḥ iti nava arṇāḥ lakāra ādayaḥ yatra tathābhūtaḥ
meruḥ iti arthaḥ
meru samudbhavāḥ iti nirukta meru varṇa utpannāḥ iti arthaḥ
atha etat meru bhūta varṇebhyaḥ pṛthivī ādīnām utpattim āha lakārāt ityādinā evam ca

original: pṛthivyā bījabhūtatvādeva lakārasya pṛthvībījamiti saṃjñā | evamanyatrāpi |

akārāt śiva saṃyogāt vyoma maṇḍalam āsthitā
īkārāt hi sa kartrī iyam māyā turya ātmikā parā
ekārāt vaiṣṇavī śaktiḥ viśva pālana tatparā

original: likhet | tatpūrvakoṣṭhe dvitīyamakṣaraṃ śrīmiti | tṛtīye āgneye tṛtīyamakṣaraṃ preti | caturthe
analyzed: likhet tad pūrva koṣṭhe dvitīyam akṣaram śrīm iti tṛtīye āgneye tṛtīyam akṣaram pra iti caturthe

original: yāmye caturthamakṣaraṃ keti | pañcame nair-ṛte pañcamamakṣaraṃ śeti | ṣaṣṭhe paścime
analyzed: yāmye caturtham akṣaram ka iti pañcame nairṛte pañcamam akṣaram śa iti ṣaṣṭhe paścime

original: ṣaṣṭhamakṣaraṃ neti | saptame vāyavye saptamamakṣaraṃ ndeti | aṣṭame'ṣṭamamakṣaraṃ neti |
analyzed: ṣaṣṭham akṣaram na iti saptame vāyavye saptamam akṣaram nda iti  aṣṭame aṣṭamam akṣaram na iti

original: navame navamamakṣaraṃ theti | evañca madhyamanavake madhyataḥ pūrvādi prādakṣiṇyena hrīṃ
analyzed: navame navamam akṣaram tha iti evam ca madhyama navake madhyatas pūrva ādi prādakṣiṇyena hrīṃ

original: śrīṃ pra kā śā na nda nā theti nava varṇānekaikaśo likhediti madhyamanavakaprakriyā |
analyzed: śrīṃ pra kā śā na nda nā thā iti nava varṇān ekaikaśas likhet iti madhyama navaka prakriyā
evam anyeṣu api aṣṭasu koṣṭheṣu avaśiṣṭānām aṣṭānām nāthānām viniyogaḥ sudhībhiḥ unneyaḥ
sphuṭam avadhānāya guru maṇḍala citram pradarśyate

analyzed: pūrṇāparvaṇi tad madhye kṛtvā sūtram trayam trayam

original: ṣoḍaśakoṣṭhasampattaye niruktaikāśītipada-maṇḍale viśeṣamāha pūrṇetyādinā | atra tu
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa koṣṭha sampattaye nirukta ekāśīti pada maṇḍale viśeṣam āha pūrṇa ityādinā atra tu

original: tanmadhye prāguktanavakamadhye trīṇi trīṇi sūtrāṇyubhayato vinyasya ṣoḍaśīkṛtya ubhayataḥ
analyzed: tad madhye prāc ukta navaka madhye trīṇi trīṇi sūtrāṇi ubhayatas vinyasya ṣoḍaśīkṛtya ubhayatas

original: sūtratrayanyāseneti śeṣaḥ teṣveva ṣoḍaśapadakoṣṭheṣu tāni ṣoḍaśākṣarāṇi nāmāni
analyzed: sūtra traya nyāsena iti śeṣaḥ teṣu eva ṣoḍaśa pada koṣṭheṣu tāni ṣoḍaśa akṣarāṇi nāmāni
likhet iti arthaḥ
etat uktam bhavati prāñc ukta guru maṇḍale navakānām madhyama koṣṭha madhya deśe

original: ekaikaśaḥ pūrvāparāyatā navakatrayavyāpinyastisraḥ dakṣiṇottarāyatāśca tisro rekhāḥ
analyzed: ekaikaśas pūrva apara āyatāḥ navaka traya vyāpinyaḥ tisraḥ dakṣiṇa uttara āyatāḥ ca tisraḥ rekhāḥ

original: kartavyāḥ | evaṃ kṛte sarvāṇi navakāni ṣoḍaśakoṣṭhātmakāni jāyante iti | ityabhiprāyeṇaiva
analyzed: kartavyāḥ evam kṛte sarvāṇi navakāni ṣoḍaśa koṣṭha ātmakāni jāyante iti iti abhiprāyeṇa eva

original: ṣoḍaśīkṛtyetyuktam | likhediti | tatra nāmāni hrīṃ śrīṃ pra kā śā na nda nā tha pā du
analyzed: ṣoḍaśīkṛtya iti uktam likhet iti tatra nāmāni hrīṃ śrīṃ pra kā śā na nda nā tha pā du

original: kāṃ pū ja yā mi ityādi rūpāṇi prāgupadarśitāni likhedityarthaḥ | atra ṣoḍaśakoṣṭheṣu
analyzed: kāṃ pū ja yā mi ityādi rūpāṇi prāk upadarśitāni likhet iti arthaḥ atra ṣoḍaśa koṣṭheṣu

original: ṣoḍaśākṣaranāmārṇanyāsavidhānāt pratikoṣṭhamekaikaṃ varṇaṃ likhediti bodhyam | likhanantu
analyzed: ṣoḍaśa akṣara nāma arṇa nyāsa vidhānāt pratikoṣṭham ekaikam varṇam likhet iti bodhyam likhanam tu

original: pūrvoktarītyā prādakṣiṇyenaiva, viśeṣānabhidhānāt | tathā prāguktamaṇḍale madhyakoṣṭhato
analyzed: pūrva ukta rītyā prādakṣiṇyena eva viśeṣa an abhidhānāt tathā prāc ukta maṇḍale
varṇa nyāsa vidhānāt atra api prathamam madhyama koṣṭha catuṣke tatas bahis koṣṭheṣu iti avadheyam
atas eva tantrarāje dvitīya paṭale pūrṇa ityādi etad samāna ānupūrvīka vacana vyākhyāyām
subhagānandanāthena madhya catuṣṭaye vāma adhas sthitam koṣṭham ārabhya madhya catuṣṭayam

original: prādakṣiṇyena parītyāmuktakramaṃ bahirapi tathā parīyādityuktam | tadatra kulanāthānāṃ
analyzed: prādakṣiṇyena parītyā āmukta kramam bahis api tathā parīyāt iti uktam tat atra kula nāthānām
tad nāma arṇānām ca saṃsthānam dvitīyena guru maṇḍala citreṇa pradarśyate

original: (p. 424) (jīvato mṛtasya vā guroḥ krameṇānena pūjāyāḥ kartavyatvam)
analyzed: jīvataḥ mṛtasya vā guroḥ krameṇa anena pūjāyāḥ kartavya tvam
evam pūjā gurau samīritā
sthānāni maṇḍalīkṛtya tatra arcā lekhane mate  /
nirukta krameṇa anuṣṭhitāyāḥ pūjāyāḥ phalam
evam yaḥ pūjayet nāthān parvasu avahitaḥ budhaḥ
sa deśika varaḥ siddhaḥ tasmāt vidyā āptiḥ uttamā
vaiparītye doṣaḥ
anyathā avāptiḥ ubhayoḥ anarthāya su niścitam
vyādhi śastra ādi pīḍā vā vitandrā vijane mṛtiḥ
ityādi vyasana āptiḥ ca nṛpāt aśanitaḥ mṛtiḥ
tasmāt ukta krameṇa eva kuryāt sarva artha siddhaye
parva saptakam
guroḥ tu janma divasam vidyā prāpti dinam tathā
sva janma divasam ca atha vyāpti vāsaram eva vā

original: 52 | gurau jīvati mṛte cāyameva gurumaṇḍalapūjākrama ityevāha evaṃ pūjetyādinā |
analyzed: gurau jīvati mṛte ca ayam eva guru maṇḍala pūjā kramaḥ iti eva āha evam pūjā ityādinā

original: parantu mṛte gurau maṇḍalapūjāyāṃ yasminnaṃśe viśeṣastamāha sthānānītyādinā | tatra
analyzed: parantu mṛte gurau maṇḍala pūjāyām yasmin aṃśe viśeṣaḥ tam āha sthānāni ityādinā tatra

original: sthānāni maṇḍalīkṛtyeti vṛttarūpeṇālikhyetyarthaḥ | tatra vṛttīkṛte maṇḍale arccā-lekhane arcā
analyzed: sthānāni maṇḍalīkṛtya iti vṛtta rūpeṇa ālikhya iti arthaḥ tatra vṛttīkṛte maṇḍale arccā lekhane arcā

original: pūjā lekhanaṃ mantrārṇānām | ete mate ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pūjā lekhanam mantra arṇānām ete mate iti arthaḥ

original: 54 | pūrvaṃ maṇḍalapūjādīnāṃ yaḥ krama uktastadanyathākaraṇe doṣamāha-anyatheti
analyzed: pūrvam maṇḍala pūjā ādīnām yaḥ kramaḥ uktaḥ tad anyathā karaṇe doṣam āha anyathā iti
anyathā nirukta krama vaiparītyena ubhayoḥ guru śiṣyayoḥ avāptiḥ anarthāya bhavati iti śeṣaḥ anarthān eva
darśayati vyādhi ityādinā

original: ṣaṭ parvāṇi viśiṣṭāni sadarśaṃ sapta parvikāḥ || 57 ||
analyzed: ṣaḍ parvāṇi viśiṣṭāni sadarśam sapta parvikāḥ
atra pūjāyāḥ kartavyatā
māsataḥ varṣataḥ vā api kuryāt eteṣu pūjanam
tatra viśeṣaḥ
guroḥ tu jīvataḥ nityam vyāpte tad putraka ādikam
pūjayet tad samam tantu praṇāma ādyaiḥ upācaret
guru tad putra ādīnām abhāve kartavyam
tad abhāve tad kulīnam tad uktam vā samarcayet
nigamanam

tatas kuṇḍalinī utthāpanam
mūlādhāra catur dalāt atha parām vidyut latā bhāsurām
sūkṣmām padma mṛṇāla tantu sadṛśīm haṃsena mokṣa ālaye
nītvā brahma sanātanena mahatām eka ātma rūpam bhajet
paścāt mūla saroruha imṛta mayīm soham smaran prārthayet

original: 56-57 | pūrvam evaṃ navanavopetaṃ maṇḍalaṃ sarvaparvasvityuktam, tānyeva
analyzed: pūrvam evam nava nava upetam maṇḍalam sarva parvasu iti uktam tāni eva

original: pāribhāṣikāṇi parvāṇi nirdiśati  gurorityādinā | vidyāprāptidinaṃ dīkṣādinam |
analyzed: pāribhāṣikāṇi parvāṇi nirdiśati guroḥ ityādinā vidyā prāpti dinam dīkṣā dinam

original: vyāptivāsaraṃ mṛtyudinaṃ guroriti śeṣaḥ | akṣaratrayasampātadinam iti, vargākṣaradvayaṃ
analyzed: vyāpti vāsaram mṛtyu dinam guroḥ iti śeṣaḥ akṣara traya sampāta dinam iti varga akṣara dvayam

original: ghaṭikākṣarañceti trīṇyakṣarāṇi yasmin dine saṅgatāni bhavanti tadakṣaratrayasampātadinamiti
analyzed: ghaṭikā akṣaram ca iti trīṇi akṣarāṇi yasmin dine bhavanti tat akṣara traya sampāta dinam iti
tantrarāja pañcaviṃśa paṭale viśiṣya abhihitaḥ iti vistara bhayāt na iha prapañcyate

original: 58 | māsata iti | pratimāsaṃ tadsambhave prativarṣameteṣu gurārjanmadivasādiṣu
analyzed: iti
pūjanam kuryāt iti sambandhaḥ

analyzed: mūlādhāra iti ayam arthaḥ ṣaṣṭhe prakāśe nītvā tām

original: kāmaṃ kāma ca sarvameva janato ṅe'ntaḥ priyo hṛdyuto
analyzed: kāmam kāma ca sarvam eva priyaḥ
mantraḥ danta viśodhanāya gaditaḥ tantra anusāra kramāt

original: mūlenaiva śikhāṃ tripuṇḍratilakaṃ kṛtvā ca tatra kramā-
analyzed: mūlena eva śikhām tripuṇḍra tilakam kṛtvā ca tatra kramā

original: dācāmet tripurāṃ vidhāya purato nyāsau karāṅgau tataḥ |
analyzed: dācāmet tripurām vidhāya puratas nyāsau kara aṅgau tatas
kuryāt śrī kramasaṃhitā ukta paramām sandhyām yata antar manāḥ

original: yāṃ kṛtvā tripurāṃ parāṃ bhagavatīmārādhya devo bhavet || 66 ||
analyzed: yām kṛtvā tripurām parām bhagavatīm ārādhya devaḥ bhavet

original: 65 | dantadhāvanamantramāha  kāmamityādinā | kāmaṃ kāmabījaṃ klīṃ | tataḥ
analyzed: dantadhāvana mantram āha kāmam ityādinā kāmam kāmabījam   tatas

original: kāma kāmadevapadam | tataḥ sarvapadam | tato janataḥ jana iti padāt ṅe'ntaścaturthyantaḥ priya
analyzed: kāma kāmadeva padam tatas sarva padam tatas janataḥ jana iti padāt ṅe ntaḥ caturthī antaḥ priya

original: iti padam | etena priyāyeti prāptam | hṛdyutaḥ namaḥpadāntaḥ | evañca klīṃ
analyzed: iti padam etena priyāya iti prāptam hṛdi utaḥ namaḥ pada antaḥ evam ca klīṃ

original: kāmadevasarvajanapriyāya namaḥ | iti caturdaśākṣaro mantraḥ paryavasyati | atra
analyzed: kāmadeva sarva jana priyāya namaḥ iti caturdaśa akṣaraḥ mantraḥ paryavasyati atra
dvitīya kāma padena kāmadeva iti akṣara catuṣṭayam bodhyam vyaktam āha kaula āvalīnirṇaye
prathama ullāse
kāmabījam kāmadevam sarva ante janam ālikhet
priyāya hṛdaya anta uyam manuḥ danta viśuddhaye
iti gandharvatantre pañcama paṭale pi
klīma ātmakam kāmadeva sarva ante janam ālikhet
priyāya hṛdaya anta uyam manuḥ danta viśuddhaye

original: trailokyasya tvahaṃ kartā dhyātvaivaṃ tilake nyaset |

analyzed: pañcadaśe snāna anantaram tāntrika sandhyāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa tvāt atra tad anavasara tvāt ca
sugamam anyat
śiraḥ iti pūrva śloke prātar kṛtyā aṅgatayā

original: ca śira-ādiṣu pañcadaśasu sthāneṣu krameṇa pūrvopadarśitaśrīvidyā-

bhāṣā pañca mayīm devīm saubhāgyām pañcamīm tatas
aṇima ādīn ca santarpya brahmāṇī ādi aṣṭadevatāḥ
saṃkṣobhaṇī ādi mudrāḥ ca tripurām prakaṭām tatas
kāma ākarṣaṇa rūpa ādi tarpayet tripureśvarīm
sugupta yoginīḥ tatra anaṅga kusuma ādikāḥ
sundarīm tarpayet tatra suṣuptatara yoginīm
saṃkṣobhaṇī ādi śaktīḥ ca tathā tripuravāsinīm
yoginī sampradāyāḥ ca sarva siddhi ādi devatāḥ
śrī parām tripurām nityām tarpayet kula yoginīm
sarvajña ādīn ca santarpya tathā tripuramālinīm
vidarbha yoginīḥ tatra vaśinī ādi aṣṭa devatāḥ
tarpayet tripurām siddhām rahasya yoginīḥ tathā
jambha ādīn tripurām devīm ati rahasya yoginīm
ṣaḍaṅga yuvatīm ca eva kāmeśvarī ādikam trayam
mūlavidyām tatas mantrī mahā tripurasundarīm
sarva ānanda mayam cakram tathā eva parameśvarīm
catur samayadevīm tu bauddha ādi devatām tatas
vaṭuka ādīn ca santarpya ekaika añjalinā sudhīḥ
sva sva sthāne mahādevīm bindau dvādaśadhā punar
tarpaṇam ca samāpya atha tri vāram prokṣaṇam tanu
tridhā ca arghyam dineśāya tad mukham samyak utkṣipet
hema ambhoja prabāla prathima nija rucim cāru khaṭvāṅga padmau

original: mahāprabhāvaṃ yat kṛtvā sānnidhyaṃ traipuraṃ bhavet || 184 ||
analyzed: mahā prabhāvam yat kṛtvā sānnidhyam traipuram bhavet
viṣādi damanam ca eva sarva śastra astra vāraṇam

original: tat praṇāmaṃ na soḍhā'sti vinā viṣṇuṃ vinā śivam || 186 ||

original: nyasantaṃ sādhakaṃ dṛṣṭvā palāyante drutaṃ grahāḥ || 187 ||

ḍākinī ādyāḥ mahauṣadhyaḥ palāyante mahā uragāḥ
sūrya candra ādayaḥ sarve kampante nati bhīṣitāḥ
vyādhayaḥ rogiṇaḥ tyaktvā palāyante ca satvaram
tad pāṇi sparśa tṛptyā api preta bhūtāḥ su dāruṇāḥ
agnayaḥ śīta tām yānti tad gātra sparśa mātrataḥ

original: brahmāstrādīni sarvāṇi yaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānti saumyatām |

original: ityādinā | tathā ca, hrīṃ śrīṃ ṣoḍaśadalapadmāya nama iti vakṣyamāṇadakṣakarṇādiṣu
analyzed: ityādinā tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ ṣoḍaśa dala padmāya namaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇa dakṣa karṇa ādiṣu
vyāpaka tvena vinyaset iti arthaḥ kāma ākarṣiṇikā ādyāḥ ca iti dakṣa karṇa ādi pāda tala ante
ṣu aṣṭasu aṅgeṣu vilomena eṣu deśeṣu ityādi abhidhānāt pāda tala ādi vāma karṇa anteṣu
ca aṣṭasu aṅgeṣu iti ṣoḍaśa aṅgeṣu ṣoḍaśa patra rūpeṣu kāmākarṣiṇī prabhṛtayaḥ ṣoḍaśa

original: guptayoginyo nyastavyā ityarthaḥ | vyaktamāha yoginīhṛdaye tṛtīyapaṭale 
analyzed: gupta yoginyaḥ nyastavyāḥ iti arthaḥ vyaktam āha yoginīhṛdaye tṛtīya paṭale
tad antar ṣoḍaśa dala padmāya namaḥ iti api
vinyasya tad dale kāmākarṣiṇī ādyāḥ ca vinyaset
dalāni dakṣiṇa śrotra pṛṣṭham aṃsam ca kūrparam
kara pṛṣṭham ca ūru jānu gulpa pāda talam tathā
vāma pāda tala ādi evam etat eva aṣṭakam matam iti
kāmākarṣiṇī ādyāḥ tu kāmākarṣiṇī buddhyākarṣiṇī ahaṅkārākarṣiṇī śabdākarṣiṇī
sparśa ākarṣiṇī rūpa ākarṣiṇī rasa ākarṣiṇī gandha ākarṣiṇī citta ākarṣiṇī dhairya ākarṣiṇī
smṛti ākarṣiṇī nāma ākarṣiṇī bīja ākarṣiṇī ātma ākarṣiṇī amṛta ākarṣiṇī śarīra ākarṣiṇyaḥ ṣoḍaśa
etad pramāṇa ādayaḥ tu aṣṭādaśa prakāśe pūjā prakaraṇe vakṣyante tatra ca
bīja dvaya svara ādyāḥ ca ākarṣiṇī antakāḥ kramāt
nityākalā iti ca tatas saptākṣaryā arcayet kramāt

original: (p. 532) etāḥ sarvāstu yoginyo guptā rakṣantu bhūtale |
analyzed: etāḥ sarvāḥ tu yoginyaḥ guptāḥ rakṣantu bhū tale
anena vyāpakam kṛtvā nāyikām tripureśvarīm
sarva vidrāviṇīm mudrām tathā vai brahma darśanam
etat trayam nyaset liṅge guruṇā ukta vidhānataḥ
tṛtīya āvaraṇa nyāsaḥ
tatas aṣṭadala padmāya namaḥ nte vyāpakam nyaset
anaṅga kusuma ādīni daivatāni nyaset tatas
dakṣa gaṇḍe stana ūrddhve ca dakṣa ūrau dakṣa gulphake
vāma gulpha ādikam kṛtvā vilomena eṣu sādhakaḥ

original: iti tantrarājacaturthapaṭalokteḥ pūrvavad hrīṃ śrīmiti bījadvayapūrvakamekaikasvarayogeṇa nyāsaḥ
analyzed: iti tantrarāja caturtha paṭala ukteḥ pūrvavat hrīṃ śrīm iti bīja dvaya pūrvakam ekaika svara yogeṇa nyāsaḥ

original: kartavyaḥ | tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ aṃ kāmākarṣiṇīnityākalāyai nama iti dakṣakarṇe | hrīṃ
analyzed: kartavyaḥ tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ aṃ kāma ākarṣiṇī nityākalāyai namaḥ iti dakṣa karṇe

original: śrīṃ āṃ buddhyākarṣiṇīnityākalāyai nama iti dakṣapṛṣṭhe | evaṃ dakṣapādatalāvadhi
analyzed: śrīṃ āṃ buddhi ākarṣiṇī nityākalāyai namaḥ iti dakṣa pṛṣṭhe evam dakṣa pāda tala avadhi

original: gandhākarṣiṇyantaḥ vinyasya punarvāmapādatalād dakṣakarṇāvadhi cittakarṣiṇyādyā aṣṭau
analyzed: gandhākarṣiṇī antar vinyasya punar vāma pāda talāt dakṣa karṇa avadhi cittakarṣiṇī ādyāḥ aṣṭau

original: nyaset | tatkramastu hrīṃ śrīṃ ḹṃ cittākarṣiṇīnityākalāyai nama iti vāmapadatale | hrīṃ śrīṃ
analyzed: nyaset tad kramaḥ tu hrīṃ śrīṃ ḹṃ citta ākarṣiṇī nityākalāyai namaḥ iti vāma pada tale   śrīṃ

original: ḷṃ dhairyākarṣiṇīnityākalāyai nama iti vāmagulphe | evamanyeṣāmapi prayogakramo bodhyaḥ |
analyzed: ḷṃ dhairya ākarṣiṇī nityākalāyai namaḥ iti vāma gulphe evam anyeṣām api prayoga kramaḥ bodhyaḥ

original: 417-418 | etā iti | etāḥ sarvāstvityādi niruktasṛṣṭicakre vyāpakatvena vinyasya ityarthaḥ |
analyzed: etāḥ iti etāḥ sarvāḥ tu ityādi nirukta sṛṣṭicakre vyāpaka tvena vinyasya iti arthaḥ

original: nāyikāmiti śrīcakranāyikāmityarthaḥ | tathā ca pūrvavad bījadvayamuccārya
analyzed: nāyikām iti śrī cakra nāyikām iti arthaḥ tathā ca pūrvavat bīja dvayam uccārya

original: tripureśvarīcakranāyikāyai namaḥ, sarvavidrāviṇīmudrāyai namaḥ, tathā brahmadarśanāya nama
analyzed: tripura īśvarī cakra nāyikāyai namaḥ sarva vidrāviṇī mudrāyai namaḥ tathā brahma darśanāya
etat trayam liṅge nyaset guruṇā ukta vidhānataḥ iti tripurārcanarahasya tantrasārīya pūjā prakaraṇayoḥ tu
cakranāyikāyāḥ bālā bīja pūrvaka tvam sarvavidrāviṇī mudrāyāḥ ca māyā bīja pūrvaka tvam dṛśyate

original: | tantrasāre brahmadarśanāyetyatra baudhadarśanāyeti | tripurārcanarahasye tvasya parigraho na
analyzed: tantrasāre brahma darśanāya iti atra baudha darśanāya iti tripurārcanarahasye tu asya parigrahaḥ na
kṛtaḥ evam ca atra nānā tantreṣu mata bheda darśanāt sva sva guru upadeśa anusāreṇa
pravartitavyam iti eva āha guruṇā ukta vidhānte iti anena
evam dvitīya āvaraṇe ṣoḍaśa dale nyāsasya prakriyām abhidhāya

original: tadantastṛtīyāvaraṇe'ṣṭadale nyāsasya rpakriyāmāha-tata ityādinā | atrāpi viśeṣānabhidhānāt
analyzed: tad antar tṛtīya āvaraṇa iṣṭa dale nyāsasya rpa kriyām āha tatas ityādinā atra api viśeṣa anabhidhānāt

original: etā guptatarāḥ sarvāḥ pāntu cāṣṭadale sthitāḥ || 421 ||
analyzed: etāḥ guptatarāḥ sarvāḥ pāntu ca aṣṭadale sthitāḥ  /
anena vyāpakam kṛtvā śrīmat tripurasundarīm
ākarṣiṇīm mahāmudrām tathā vai śaiva darśanam
etad nyāsam nābhi deśe vinyaset sādhaka uttamaḥ
caturtha āvaraṇa nyāsaḥ
caturdaśa ara cakrāya namaḥ nte vyāpakam nyaset
sarva saṃkṣobhiṇī ityādyāḥ tasya koṇeṣu sādhakaḥ
pūrvavat māyā śrī bīja pūrvakatvam avagantavyam tathā aṣṭādaśa prakāśe cakra pūjā prakaraṇe

original: aṣṭapatre yajenmantrī kādivargāntakena ca iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt tripurārcanarahasyakārairapi tathaiva
analyzed: aṣṭa patre yajet mantrī ka ādi varga antakena ca iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tripura arcana rahasya kāraiḥ api tathā eva
nyāsa prayogasya abhidhānāt ca varga ādya varṇa pūrvakam anaṅga kusuma ādīnām aṣṭānām nyāsaḥ

original: kartavya iti tattvam | tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ aṣṭadalapadmāya nama iti vyāpakatvena vinyasedityarthaḥ
analyzed: kartavyaḥ iti tattvam tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ aṣṭadala padmāya namaḥ iti vyāpaka tvena vinyaset iti arthaḥ
tripurārcanarahasye api tatas unaṅga kusuma ādi sthāneṣu aṣṭadala padma cakrāya namaḥ iti

original: saṃvyāpyetyuktam | anaṅgeti | tato dakṣagaṇḍādidakṣagulphānte sthānacatuṣṭaye tathā vilomena
analyzed: saṃvyāpya iti uktam anaṅga iti tatas dakṣa gaṇḍa ādi dakṣa gulpha ante sthāna catuṣṭaye tathā vilomena
vāma gulpha ādi vāma gaṇḍa ante sthāna catuṣṭaye krameṇa ananga kusuma ādyāḥ aṣṭau nyaset iti
sambandhaḥ anaṅga kusuma ādyāḥ ca

original: naṅgamālinyaḥ | pramāṇādayastu aṣṭādaśe vakṣyante | tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ kaṃ
analyzed: naṅgamālinyaḥ pramāṇa ādayaḥ tu aṣṭādaśe vakṣyante tathā ca hrīṃ śrīṃ kaṃ

original: anaṅgakusumāyai nama iti dakṣagaṇḍe | ityādikrameṇa dakṣagulphāvadhi vinyasya punarvilomena
analyzed: anaṅgakusumāyai namaḥ iti dakṣa gaṇḍe ityādi krameṇa dakṣa gulpha avadhi vinyasya punar vilomena

original: hrīṃ śrīṃ paṃ anaṅgarekhāyai nama ityādikrameṇa vāmagulphato vāmagaṇḍāvadhi
analyzed: hrīṃ śrīṃ paṃ anaṅgarekhāyai namaḥ ityādi krameṇa vāma gulphataḥ vāma gaṇḍa avadhi
anaṅgamālinī antāḥ vinyaset iti phalitam śiṣṭam sugamam

original: 422 | aneneti tṛtīyāvaraṇa ityādinetyarthaḥ | tripurārcanarahasye tu etā guptatarayoginyaḥ
analyzed: anena iti tṛtīya āvaraṇe ityādinā iti arthaḥ tripurārcanarahasye tu etāḥ guptatara yoginyaḥ

original: sarvasaṃkṣobhaṇe cakre samudrā iti catuṣṭayaṃ hṛdaye vinyasyetyuktam | śrīmaditi |
analyzed: sarva saṃkṣobhaṇe cakre samudrāḥ iti catuṣṭayam hṛdaye vinyasya iti uktam śrīmat iti

original: śrīmattripurasundaryai namaḥ sarvākarṣiṇyai namaḥ śaivadarśanāya nama iti ca nābhideśe
analyzed: śrīmat tripurasundaryai namaḥ sarva ākarṣiṇyai namaḥ śaiva darśanāya namaḥ iti ca nābhi deśe
nyaset iti phalitam
atha aṣṭadala antar caturdaśa racakra prakriyām nirūpayati caturdaśa ityādinā

original: atrāpi pūrvavanmāyāśrībījapūrvakaṃ kādiḍhāntākṣara-yojanayā vinyaset | tathā ca
analyzed: atra api pūrvavat māyā śrī bīja pūrvakam kādi ḍha anta akṣara yojanayā vinyaset tathā ca
caturdaśa āra
lalāṭa dakṣiṇe bhāge gaṇḍa aṃsa pṛṣṭakeṣu ca
pārśva antar ūru jaṅghāsu dakṣa āvartena vinyaset

original: vilomenaiṣu deśeṣu pṛṣṭhe paścādi yān kramaḥ |
analyzed: vilomena eṣu deśeṣu pṛṣṭhe paśca ādi yān kramaḥ
cakre sat sampradāyinyaḥ pāntu koṇe caturdaśe
anena vyāpakam kṛtvā tripurāvāsinīm budhaḥ
vaśya mudrām tathā sūrya darśanam hṛdaye nyaset
cakrāya iti saṃvyāpya lalāṭa dakṣiṇa bhāga ādi dakṣa jaṅghā anteṣu sapta sthāneṣu
sarvasaṃkṣobiṇī ādyāḥ sapta vinyasya punar viloma krameṇa vāma jaṅghā ādi lalāṭa vāma bhāga anteṣu

original: pṛṣṭhavarjaṃ vinyasya paścāditi sarvāvasāne pṛṣṭe yoginīmantyāṃ vinyasedityarthaḥ |
analyzed: pṛṣṭha varjam vinyasya paścāt iti sarva avasāne pṛṣṭe yoginīm antyām vinyaset iti arthaḥ
yoginīhṛdaye tṛtīya paṭale tu
lalāṭam dakṣa bhāñca dakṣa gaṇḍa aṃsa madhyatas
pārśva antar uru jaṅghā antar vāma jaṅghā ādi pārvati
vāma ūru antam vāma pārśvam vāma aṃsam vāma gaṇḍakam
lalāṭa vāma madhye ca vai pṛṣṭham iti api

original: iti vacane dakṣapṛṣṭhe nyāsamanabhidhāya lalāṭa-lalāṭadakṣabhāgabhedena dakṣāśe
analyzed: iti vacane dakṣa pṛṣṭhe nyāsam an abhidhāya lalāṭa lalāṭa dakṣa bhāga bhedena dakṣa āśe

original: sthānasaptakamuktam | atra tu dakṣapṛṣṭhopādānāt lalāṭadakṣabhāga eva nyāso na tu
analyzed: sthāna saptakam uktam atra tu dakṣa pṛṣṭha upādānāt lalāṭa dakṣa bhāgaḥ eva nyāsaḥ na tu

original: lalāṭamadhyadeśe'pīti pūrṇānandānāmāśayaḥ pratibhātīti dhyeyam | atra pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ

analyzed: śiraḥ pṛṣṭha bodhakaḥ tat uktam amṛtānandanāthena yoginīhṛdaya ṭīkāyām pṛṣṭham iti śirasaḥ
pṛṣṭham iti jñeyam iti
sarva artha sādhinī sarva sampatti pūraṇī sarva mantra mayī sarva dvandva kṣayaṅkaryaḥ caturdaśa
viśeṣaḥ uṣṭādaśe draṣṭavyaḥ

original: evañca hrīṃ śrī/ kaṃ sarvasaṃkṣobhiṇīśaktyai nama iti dakṣalalāṭe, hrīṃ śrī/ khaṃ
analyzed: evam ca hrīṃ śrī kaṃ sarva saṃkṣobhiṇī śaktyai namaḥ iti dakṣa lalāṭe hrīṃ śrī khaṃ

original: sarvavidrāviṇyai nama it dakṣagaṇḍe ityevaṃ krameṇa nyasya punaḥ hrīṃ śrīṃ jaṃ
analyzed: sarvavidrāviṇyai namaḥ id dakṣa gaṇḍe iti evam krameṇa nyasya punar hrīṃ śrīṃ jaṃ

original: sarvavaśaṅkaryai nama ityādikrameṇa vāmajaṅghādiṣu lalāṭa-dakṣabhānteṣu nyasediti phalitam |
analyzed: sarva vaśaṅkaryai namaḥ ityādi krameṇa vāma jaṅghā ādiṣu lalāṭa dakṣa bha anteṣu nyaset iti phalitam

original: 425-426 | tataḥ karaṇīyamāha-cakra ityādinā | evañca, cakre sat-
analyzed: tatas karaṇīyam āha cakre ityādinā evam ca cakre sat
bahis daśa ara cakrāya namaḥ nte vyāpakam caret
dakṣa akṣi nāsikā mūla netra iṣu dara dakṣiṇe
vāyu koṇe jānu yugme guhya deśe nyaset api
vāma kukṣau nirṛtau ca sarva siddhi ādi devatām

original: samparadāyinya ityādivyāpakatvena vinyasya hṛdaye prathamaṃ tripurāvāsinīṃ cakreśvarīṃ tato
analyzed: iti ādi vyāpaka tvena vinyasya hṛdaye prathamam tripurā vāsinīm cakreśvarīm
vaśya mudrām tatas sūrya darśanam ca vinyaset iti arthaḥ
bhavati

original: tayorvahiḥsthitaṃ bahirdaśāraṃ tadantaḥsthitañcāntardaśāramiti jñeyam | tatra prathamaṃ
analyzed: tayoḥ vahis sthitam bahis daśa aram tad antar sthitam ca antar daśa aram iti jñeyam tatra prathamam
bahis daśa ara cakre sarva artha sādhaka ākhye nyāsasya prakriyām āha bahis ityādinā atra api

original: pūrvavanmāyā śrībījānantaraṃ ṇādibhāntākṣaraṃ dattveti pūjākrame vakṣyamāṇatvāt
analyzed: pūrvavat māyā śrī bīja anantaram ṇa ādi bha anta akṣaram dattvā iti pūjā krame vakṣyamāṇatvāt
ṇakāra ādi bhakāra antam ekaikam varṇam ādau yojayitvā sarva siddhi prada ādi daśa kula kaulika yoginīḥ nyaset
nyāsasya sthāpanāni āha dakṣa akṣa ityādinā atra amṛtānandanāthaḥ yoginīhṛdaya ṭīkāyām āha

original: bāhudvayamārabhyorudvayaparyantaṃ kukṣiśabdena lakṣyate | tena kukṣeruparibhāgaḥ prācī,
analyzed: bāhu dvayam ārabhya ūru dvaya paryantam kukṣi śabdena lakṣyate tena kukṣeḥ upari bhāgaḥ prācī

original: adhobhāgaḥ pratīcīdakṣiṇavāmapārśve dakṣiṇodīcyau | koṇaśabdena bāhu ūrū ca labhyete |
analyzed: adhobhāgaḥ pratīcī dakṣiṇa vāma pārśve dakṣiṇa udīcyau koṇa śabdena bāhu ūrū ca labhyete

original: tena vāmabāhumūlamīśakoṇo vāmorumūlaṃ vāyukoṇo dakṣiṇorumūlam, nair-ṛtakoṇo
analyzed: tena vāma bāhu mūlam īśa koṇaḥ vāma ūru mūlam vāyu koṇaḥ dakṣiṇa ūru mūlam nairṛta koṇaḥ

original: dakṣiṇabāhumūlamagnikoṇa iti | evañcātra vāyukoṇa ityanena vāmorumūlam, nair-ṛta ityanena ca
analyzed: dakṣiṇa bāhu mūlam agnikoṇe iti evañca atra vāyukoṇe iti anena vāma ūru mūlam nairṛte iti anena ca

original: dakṣiṇorumūlam ityavagamyate | tathā ca dakṣacakṣuṣi, nāsikāmūle vāmacakṣuṣi
analyzed: dakṣiṇa ūru mūlam iti avagamyate tathā ca dakṣa cakṣuṣi nāsikā mūle vāma cakṣuṣi

original: tataścodaradakṣiṇe dakṣakukṣāvityarthaḥ, tato vāmorumūle dakṣajānuni vāmajānuni guhyadeśe
analyzed: tatas ca udara dakṣiṇe dakṣa kukṣau iti arthaḥ tatas vāma ūru mūle dakṣa jānuni vāma jānuni guhya deśe

original: vāmakukṣau dakṣiṇorumūle ca sthānadaśake krameṇa sarvasiddhyādidevatā nyasediti phalitārthaḥ
analyzed: vāma kukṣau dakṣiṇa ūru mūle ca sthāna daśake krameṇa sarva siddhi ādi devatāḥ nyaset iti phalita arthaḥ
sarva siddhi ādayaḥ ca sarva siddhi pradā sarva sampad pradā sarva priyaṅkarī sarva maṅgala kāriṇī

original: sarvasaubhāgyadāyinyo'ṣṭādaśaprakāśe vakṣyamāṇāḥ | evañca hrīṃ śrīṃ ṇaṃ
sarvasidhipradāyai nama iti dakṣacakṣuṣi, hrīṃ śrīṃ taṃ sarvasampatpradāyai nama iti
analyzed: sarva sidhi pradāyai namaḥ iti dakṣa cakṣuṣi hrīṃ śrīṃ taṃ sarva sampad pradāyai namaḥ iti

original: nāsikāmūle evaṃ krameṇānyeṣvapi nirukteṣvaṅgeṣu nyasediti phalitam |
analyzed: nāsikā mūle evam krameṇa anyeṣu api nirukteṣu aṅgeṣu nyaset iti phalitam

original: cakre māṃ kulayoginyo rakṣantu daśa devatāḥ | 429 ||
analyzed: cakre mām kula yoginyaḥ rakṣantu daśa devatāḥ
anena vyāpakam kṛtvā tripura āśriyam api atha
unmādinīm vaiṣṇavam ca darśnam galakūpake
ṣaṣṭhāvāṇa nyāsaḥ
antar daśara cakrāya namaḥ nte vyāpakam caret
sarvajña ādyāḥ tatas mantrī nyaset eṣu samāhitaḥ

original: nāsāyāmatha sṛkkaṇyāṃ tale vai vṛṣaṇe gude |
analyzed: nāsāyām atha tale vai vṛṣaṇe gude
tatas vāma krameṇa eva vṛṣaṇe vinyaset stane  /

original: 429-430 | tataḥ karaṇīyamāha-sarvārthetyādinā | tathā ca sarvārthetyādi vyāpakatvena
analyzed: tatas karaṇīyam āha sarva artha ityādinā tathā ca sarva artha ityādi vyāpaka tvena

original: vinyasya tripurāśriyaṃcakreśvarīm unmādinīṃ vaiṣṇavadar'sanañca galakūpe nyasedityarthaḥ | iti

original: 432 | pūrvavacane nyasedeṣu samāhita ityauktam, tāni nyāsasthānāni nirūpayati 
